name: Lone Shark
description:
Made in just over 48 hrs for the Simmer.io gamejam.

You're a prisoner shark with an insatiable desire for fresh fish. Your addiction has you working for a loaner, requiring you to go and collect on the other prisoners in order to afford the fresh fish you desire regularly.

Goal: Find the Loaner and use him to take on missions to retrieve items and replenish your fish meter. Each item will have a prisoner guarding it, and you can choose to attack/intimidate/bluff them. Once defeated, you can take the item and return to the loan shark.

Controls:

FreeLook:

WS - forward/back

LeftShift - run

ScrollWheel -zoom in and out

Left click - interact

C - toggle combat mode

Combat:

WASD movement

Left click to swing

right click to block

tab on target to lock on

C to toggle combat mode off.
